answers.answer: HiAs I understand from your post heart pathology is ruled out. Other causes for these symptoms could be thyroid problems, diabetes, endocarditis (if not ruled out already), certain cancers, HIV/AIDS infection, complicated hiatal hernia etc. I do not think the symptoms are allergic in nature because of your pets.However it is difficult to diagnose without examining. You will need to undergo a few tests to rule out the above causes. I think you should discuss these possibilities with your doctor.Hope this helps. Please let me know if there is any thing else and do keep me posted.

Thank you for the help without insurance i have been stabalized and let go each time with no diagosis its frustrating to finally get something of a diagnosis is what i am searching for i will try and pursue it with a general practiotioner

question: I was until sept of 2008 one of the healthiest people that you will know. At that date and until today i have had the following symptoms light headed/ weak at times during the day/ elevated heart rate/ nite sweats/ tingling throuout the body at times during the night/chest pain that starts on the left side of my body and travels right to the middle/ recently blody nose when i am walking it just bleeds. I have had all the heart tests you can have and the cardiologist says its definality not my heart, but cant tell me what it is after 4 visits to the doctor. does anyone know what this is? im a 38 year old male living with 2 dogs in florida if any of that might be the probllem.
title: need help desperatly
